info.abstract:
[Behaviour] It is a stored procedure used to apply subsetting to a fragment.
[Parameters] - input fragment : name of the input fragment. - start id : first id of the new fragment. - subarray clause : clause to subset array. - output fragment : name of the output fragment. - where clause : clause to subset rows (can be "").
[Return type] Void.
[Examples] Select a subset of each array of the input fragment. Subset is applied on 'lat' and 'time' implicit dimensions. oph_subset('input_fragment', 1, ' oph_get_subarray3(measure,'oph_double','4:5',100,10,'1:2',1,100)', 'output_fragment', '')
